price: Onlar adakları yerine getirirler ve kötülüğü yaygın bir günden korkarlar.
arabic: يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذۡرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوۡمٗا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسۡتَطِيرٗا

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: yūfūna bil-nadhri wayakhāfūna yawman kāna sharruhu mus'taṭīran
